reviewText: For years we only had access to a few VHS recordings of Steptoe and Son.  I was very happy to see this was available - some are in black and white, all are a lot of fun.  This complete collection of BBC recordings and copies from other sources is the most complete available for the series.  Sadly the BBC didn't see a future in reruns and taped over many of the earlier shows, but thankfully others using their own equipment preserved many episodes never before available.
Great Compilation. A keeper for generations. Please do check your DVD players settings because this is PAL format. Good deal all in all....

This was a Christmas gift for my dad. EXCELLENT shipping time. Mechandise was in excellent condition upon arrival and dad who is English
was appreciative of the gift.
Love steptoe even as a child , my father loved them ,in a lot of ways old steptoe reminds me of my father

as a purveyor of the britcom, since the days of Benny Hill on canal  nueve..This touching  father and son story went onto inspire with one Sanford and Son series...was never released on region 1....you big dummy.

I've always been a fan of Sandford and son, so I was curious to see where it came from. I believe I prefer Steptoe and son. I have both series and it's interesting to watch the first few seasons of both because they shared some of the same scripts from Steptoe. One of the best British sitcoms ever.
If  you have a Region 2 or all Region DVD player -and love British comedy, this box set is a great deal!

This was a gift for my dad who watched this show on BBC in England when stationed there in the Air Force.  Great British humor!  I had to buy a special DVD player for him to watch them on, but it wasn't very expensive and it made for an awesome and unexpected Christmas present.
Thoroughly amusing loved the presentation box easy to look after and handle a great xmas gift for the oldies of yesteryear. Thanks
What can I say I was brought up with this series it is so funny and entertaining and still today all my friends talk about it
I bought this for my husband it is a series ws both got brought up with it is do funny although a very old series not sure if the y geb would like it
